Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma is back as captain as Hardik Pandya and Suryakumar Yadav are not fit at the moment.
Afghanistan is looking forward to continuing their winning momentum and India is also preparing to give their best.
Others: The India vs Afghanistan 1st T20I is scheduled to take place on Thursday, 11 January 2024.
The match will start at 7 pm IST on the scheduled date.
The India vs Afghanistan 1st T20I is set to be played at the IS Bindra Stadium, in Mohali.
Fans in India can follow the live broadcast of the India vs Afghanistan 1st T20I on Sports 18 and Colors Cineplex channels on Thursday.
You can watch the live streaming of the India vs Afghanistan 1st T20I on Thursday, on the JioCinema app and website.
